text:
@realDonaldTrump OH RIGHT, I forgot WW1 and WW2 were both global pandemics and should definitely be compared to the coronavirus.

God you're fucking dumb. I bet the White House cleaning crew spends hours each day wiping your tongue marks off all the windows.
